ygData.subject: Re: Help Me!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon waved to BrightBlade and pointed at the hole leading from his shoulder into his ribs. He moaned and smiled. Makes me feel better to see you here,

Gangon waved to BrightBlade and pointed at the hole leading from his
shoulder into his ribs. He moaned and smiled.

"Makes me feel better to see you here, BrightBlade." Gangon said. He leaned
against to bars...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 27, 2000 9:49 PM
Subject: Help Me!!




* BrightBlade lay on the floor of the cell in the brig, her breathing
shallow and her shivers sparking up again. She didn't move as her optics
traveled around the room, too damaged and too much energy loss to support
movement any longer.
She would have growled to herself if she would have had the strength, the
Maximals just leaving her like this and not even bothering to offer a
repair.which she would have accepted gladly.
Her optics fell upon Rex as he stayed on duty near by, not even realizing
that she was whimpering.
Damaged and captured, it couldn't get any worse.
With a shuddering sigh she turned her optics on Gangon, being in the next
cell to her, in much better condition she might add.
This was all going terribly wrong; nothing had worked out the way it was
supposed to.
However, she had to get out and she knew of a bot that could help her.
With much effort BrightBlade activated her internal transmission system,
ready to send a message that would appear right on the main screen of the
receiver.
This is what the message read: *

" Perndabot, I've got a whole smack of Maximals for you to slag. Just get to
the brig of the ship and you'll have them. But I'm injured and can't escape
myself, as well as another Predacon in the cell next to me. *sigh* I know it
sounds impossible but if you hit fast and true you'll be able to get in, get
us, slag a few Maxis and get out. There's a button on the Cloaking device
that'll help you through the shields. There should also be a power charger
that'll pump up the power on one of your blasters if you attach it to it,
that'll help you get in and out before the Maximals even know what hit them.
Now, let's get this show on the road, huh?!"

* That was all the power that she had as the message ended, her breath
becoming even shallower. Just hoping that Perndabot would puck up on such a
weak frequency.*
